name: ai-learning-companion
description: AI-powered interactive personal learning companion with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && echo 'Please configure your environment variables in backend/.env'
